parameters.name: Curve
parameters.description: Pointer to the curve to imprint on the face

parameters.name: NewEdgeCount
parameters.description: Number of new edges to create

parameters.name: NewEdges
parameters.description: Array of new edges created by the imprinted curve of size NewEdgeCount

parameters.name: NewFaceCount
parameters.description: Number of new faces to create

parameters.name: NewFaces
parameters.description: Array of new faces created by the imprinted curve of size NewFaceCount

title: IFace2.IImprintCurve
description: Imprints a curve on the selected face.
signature:
void IImprintCurve( 
   Curve
Curve
,
   System.Int32
NewEdgeCount
,
   out Edge
NewEdges
,
   System.Int32
NewFaceCount
,
   out Face2
NewFaces
)

parameters.name: Curve
parameters.description: Pointer to the curve to imprint on the face

parameters.name: NewEdgeCount
parameters.description: Number of new edges to create

parameters.name: NewEdges
parameters.description: Array of new edges created by the imprinted curve of size NewEdgeCount

parameters.name: NewFaceCount
parameters.description: Number of new faces to create

parameters.name: NewFaces
parameters.description: Array of new faces created by the imprinted curve of size NewFaceCount

remarks:
Before calling this method, call
IFace2::ImprintCurveCount
to get the size of the arrays.
The specified curve must lie on the face.
To imprint a curve on a new face of a temporary body, create a copy of the original curve and imprint the copy of the curve on the new face.
